name: Super Skydiving Accident
description:
Disaster! A group of skydivers have jumped out of a plane, but they all forgot their parachutes... You play as a superhero (complete with cape) and it is your job to swoop in and save all the skydivers by throwing them in the water before they plummet to their doom.

Made for Trijam 90, in about 2 hours and 45 minutes.

  CONTROLS:
  • Move laterally with the arrow keys.
  • Descend by holding A.
  • Ascend by holding D.
  • Catch skydivers by colliding with them.
  • Fly them over the water, then press space to drop them!
